alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Duval, northwestern San Patricio, Webb, southeastern La Salle, McMullen, northwestern Jim Wells, Live Oak and central Bee Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 804 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pettus to 7 miles north of Clegg to 17 miles south of Fort Ewell Site to near Columbia Bridge. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Beeville, Mathis, Freer, George West, Three Rivers, Tilden, Choke Canyon, Skidmore, Lake City, Midway, United South High School, Tynan, Calliham, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Simmons, Ray Point, Rosita, Las Tiendas and Seven Sisters. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 38. Interstate 37 between mile markers 35 and 82. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 664. US Highway 181 between mile markers 584 and 606. US Highway 59 between mile markers 692 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 682 and 724. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
